dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication
dependencies.name: py-filelock

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependent_to.description: A differentiable spherical harmonic transform for PyTorch.
dependent_to.name: py-torch-harmonics

description: A language and compiler for custom Deep Learning operations.
name: py-triton

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
